body_html: I'm using Tensorflow version 1.8 on both Windows 10 and Kubuntu 18.04 and notice different behavior of list_files. Using a pattern with *s will match files at any depth an Windows, as noted in this issue, whereas the proper directory depth is respected on Ubuntu.
body_text: I'm using Tensorflow version 1.8 on both Windows 10 and Kubuntu 18.04 and notice different behavior of list_files. Using a pattern with *s will match files at any depth an Windows, as noted in this issue, whereas the proper directory depth is respected on Ubuntu.
body: I'm using Tensorflow version 1.8 on both Windows 10 and Kubuntu 18.04 and notice different behavior of `list_files`. Using a pattern with `*`s will match files at any depth an Windows, as noted in this issue, whereas the proper directory depth is respected on Ubuntu.
